channel.title: php on yufulou's
channel.description: Recent content in php on yufulou's

item.title: 增加俩php5.2.17的.gdbinit方法
item.description:
最近，因为经常遇到print_cvs打印失败直接退出的问题，故做了两个方法，打印所有当前的变量名和单个变量，加到现有的.gdbinit就能用 同时记得老版本的print_zv打印的地址是错的，要把printf后面的参数改成[%p] define print_vars ____executor_globals set $p = $eg.current_execute_data.CVs set $c = $eg.current_execute_data.op_array.last_var set $v = $eg.current_execute_data.op_array.vars set $i = 0 printf "Compiled variables count: %d
", $c while $i < $c printf "%d = %s [%p] 
", $i, $v[$i].name, *$p[$i] set $i = $i + 1 end end document print_vars print all var names end define print_var ____executor_globals set $p = $eg.current_execute_data.CVs set $c = $eg.current_execute_data.op_array.last_var set $v = $eg.current_execute_data.op_array.vars set $i = 0 set $varname = $arg0 set $found_var = 0 printf "Compiled variables count: %d
", $c printf "to print var name %s
", $varname while $i < $c && 0 == $found_var if strcmp($varname, $v[$i].
